# invert()

**Instance Method**

Replaces all the characters in the receiver with all the characters it didn’t previously contain.

## Declaration

```swift
func invert()
```

## Discussion

Inverting a mutable character set, whether by [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSMutableCharacterSet/invert()] or by [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSCharacterSet/inverted], is much less efficient than inverting an immutable character set with [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSCharacterSet/inverted].

## Related Documentation

- **inverted**: A character set containing only characters that don’t exist in the receiver.
